verbose_text: In agreement with the antiviral role of PAF1 in mediating RNA polymerase II transcription elongation of ISGs, we found that siRNA mediated depletion of endogenous CDC73 resulted in defective induction of ISG15 mRNA following IFNalpha treatment (XREF_FIG A).
evidence: PAF1 in mediating RNA polymerase II transcription elongation of ISGs
